Committee asks Government to look at voting rules, ending taxpayer-funded election ads https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/committee-asks-government-to-look-at-voting-rules-ending-taxpayer-funded-election-ads/V4PIE3E37JBZBB3H3ZT5PKNHDU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/committee-asks-government-to-look-at-voting-rules-ending-taxpayer-funded-election-ads/V4PIE3E37JBZBB3H3ZT5PKNHDU/ Thomas CoughlanA divided committee wants the Government to look at voting rules.Mon, 18 Nov 2024 05:27:59 +0000 In 2020, the Government legislated to allow people to enrol or update their enrolment on polling day.
